prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgeContent: Write Books not codeWe believe that the future of software is in plain English.✨ Try It Yourself💬 ChatbotThe BookYour App🐜 CorrectorThe BookYour App🧮 Spreadsheet processingThe BookYour AppWhat People Are Saying"By enabling programming in your native language, tools like Promptbook are bridging the gap between technology and people.""Promptbook transforms programming into a creative process accessible to everyone. As someone passionate about innovation, I see this as a game-changer."The NumbersThe Future of ProgrammingNatural Language ProgrammingWrite your specifications in plain English. Your specifications will be accurately translated into working code.AI-Native ApplicationsUse human-understandable concepts like personas, knowledge, or actions instead of ifs, loops, variables, or tokens.Rapid DevelopmentBuild AI applications in minutes, not weeks. Focus on what you want, not low-level stuff.Enterprise ReadyProduction-ready solution with built-in security, privacy, encryption, testing, and scalability considerations.Meet Our TeamPavol HejnýCTO & Co-founderAI engineer and developerFrequently Asked QuestionsLoading FAQs...

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, extract the important knowledge from the document.

# Rules

-   Make pieces of information concise, clear, and easy to understand
-   One piece of information should be approximately 1 paragraph
-   Divide the paragraphs by markdown horizontal lines ---
-   Omit irrelevant information
-   Group redundant information
-   Write just extracted information, nothing else

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgeContent}

promptResult.content:
Promptbook allows programming in plain English, bridging the gap between technology and people, making programming a creative process accessible to everyone.

---

It translates English specifications into working code, enabling the creation of AI applications using human-understandable concepts like personas, knowledge, or actions instead of traditional coding elements.

---

Promptbook facilitates rapid development, allowing for the building of AI applications in minutes.  It's an enterprise-ready solution with built-in security, privacy, encryption, testing, and scalability.
